famous quote:
Forgiveness condones nothing, but it does cast off the chains of anger, judgment, resentment, denial, and pain that choke growth. In this way, it allows for life, for freedom.
-Michele Harper (in "The Beauty in Breaking")
Interview Text:
Hannah Noble:

(part 10)

She remembers moments in their old "Yellow House? when they were going through the church difficulties. She said, "It was a good place to be, but it was very hollow. God met us there, but it was sort of like a shanty in the desert. When everything was going so badly, my daughter woke up several times to nightmares. I walked into her nursery several times, feeling a bad presence. And I would wake up and feel something moving up my leg, and it wasn?t David.? 

She said, ?The reality is that I can?t be touched because the Lord had given me that identification. I think through my story, and I think if people really understand that who they are is intricately wired as sonship or daughtership of the most high, they wouldn?t be afraid.?
Music Video Instructions: Pray this prayer with Chris Martin and friends.
